tags.name: Fiat
tags.description: Operations related to fiat onramping and offramping

appSecretAuth.description: Basic Auth header with your app ID as the username and your app secret as the password.

oneOf.description: The P-256 public key of the owner of the resource. If you provide this, do not specify an owner_id as it will be generated automatically.
oneOf.title: Public key owner

oneOf.description: The user ID of the owner of the resource. The user must already exist, and this value must start with "did:privy:". If you provide this, do not specify an owner_id as it will be generated automatically.
oneOf.title: User owner

OwnerInput.description: The owner of the resource. If you provide this, do not specify an owner_id as it will be generated automatically. When updating a wallet, you can set the owner to null to remove the owner.

OwnerIdInput.description: The key quorum ID to set as the owner of the resource. If you provide this, do not specify an owner.

items.description: The array of policy IDs that will be applied to wallet requests. If specified, this will override the base policy IDs set on the wallet.

id.description: Unique ID of the wallet. This will be the primary identifier when using the wallet in the future.

public_key.description: The compressed, raw public key for the wallet along the chain cryptographic curve.

created_at.description: Unix timestamp of when the wallet was created in milliseconds.

policy_ids.description: List of policy IDs for policies that are enforced on the wallet.

owner_id.description: The key quorum ID of the owner of the wallet.

exported_at.description: Unix timestamp of when the wallet was exported in milliseconds, if the wallet was exported.

imported_at.description: Unix timestamp of when the wallet was imported in milliseconds, if the wallet was imported.

HPKEEncryption.description: The encryption type of the wallet to import. Currently only supports `HPKE`.

WalletImportSupportedChains.description: The chain type of the wallet to import. Currently supports `ethereum` and `solana`.

address.description: The address of the wallet to import.

PrivateKeyInitInput.description: The input for private key wallets.

address.description: The address of the wallet to import.

entropy_type.description: The entropy type of the wallet to import.

index.description: The index of the wallet to import.

address.description: The address of the wallet to import.

ciphertext.description: The encrypted entropy of the wallet to import.

encapsulated_key.description: The base64-encoded encapsulated key that was generated during encryption, for use during decryption inside the TEE.

address.description: The address of the wallet to import.

entropy_type.description: The entropy type of the wallet to import.

index.description: The index of the wallet to import.

ciphertext.description: The encrypted entropy of the wallet to import.

encapsulated_key.description: The base64-encoded encapsulated key that was generated during encryption, for use during decryption inside the TEE.

recipient_public_key.description: The base64-encoded encryption public key to encrypt the wallet private key with.

encapsulated_key.description: The base64-encoded encapsulated key that was generated during encryption, for use during decryption.

CustomMetadata.description: Custom metadata associated with the user.

created_at.description: Unix timestamp of when the user was created in milliseconds.

has_accepted_terms.description: Indicates if the user has accepted the terms of service.

is_guest.description: Indicates if the user is a guest account user.

linked_accounts.bio: engineering at /privy. building pixelpool.xyz, the first Farcaster video client. nyc.   nf.td/payton

LinkedAccountInput.description: The input for adding a linked account to a user.
LinkedAccountInput.title: LinkedAccountInput

PolicyChainType.description: The chain type the policy applies to.

EthereumTransactionCondition.description: The verbatim Ethereum transaction object in an eth_signTransaction or eth_sendTransaction request.
EthereumTransactionCondition.title: ethereum_transaction

EthereumCalldataCondition.description: The decoded calldata in a smart contract interaction as the smart contract method's parameters. Note that that 'ethereum_calldata' conditions must contain an abi parameter with the JSON ABI of the smart contract.
EthereumCalldataCondition.title: ethereum_calldata

EthereumTypedDataDomainCondition.description: Attributes from the signing domain that will verify the signature.
EthereumTypedDataDomainCondition.title: ethereum_typed_data_domain

EthereumTypedDataMessageCondition.description: 'types' and 'primary_type' attributes of the TypedData JSON object defined in EIP-712.
EthereumTypedDataMessageCondition.title: ethereum_typed_data_message

Ethereum7702AuthorizationCondition.description: Allowed contract addresses for eth_signAuthorization requests.
Ethereum7702AuthorizationCondition.title: ethereum_7702_authorization

SolanaProgramInstructionCondition.description: Solana Program attributes, enables allowlisting Solana Programs.
SolanaProgramInstructionCondition.title: solana_program_instruction

SolanaSystemProgramInstructionCondition.description: Solana System Program attributes, including more granular Transfer instruction fields.
SolanaSystemProgramInstructionCondition.title: solana_system_program_instruction

SolanaTokenProgramInstructionCondition.description: Solana Token Program attributes, including more granular TransferChecked instruction fields.
SolanaTokenProgramInstructionCondition.title: solana_token_program_instruction

SystemCondition.description: System attributes, including current unix timestamp (in seconds).
SystemCondition.title: system

PolicyCondition.description: A condition that must be true for the rule action to be applied.
PolicyCondition.title: PolicyCondition

PolicyAction.description: Action to take if the conditions are true.
PolicyAction.title: PolicyAction

PolicyRule.description: The rules that apply to each method the policy covers.
PolicyRule.title: PolicyRule

PolicyRuleResponse.description: A rule that defines the conditions and action to take if the conditions are true.
PolicyRuleResponse.title: PolicyRuleResponse

version.description: Version of the policy. Currently, 1.0 is the only version.

id.description: Unique ID of the created policy. This will be the primary identifier when using the policy in the future.

owner_id.description: The key quorum ID of the owner of the policy.

created_at.description: Unix timestamp of when the policy was created in milliseconds.

post.summary: Configure app for fiat onramping and offramping.

200.description: Success message if the app was configured successfully
